text: Philipp Graf von und zu Lerchenfeld (25 May 1952 – 1 December 2017) was a German politician. He was member of the Christian Social Union in Bavaria (CSU). He was a member of the Landtag of Bavaria from 2003 to 2013. He then served as a member of the Bundestag from 2013 to 2017. Besides being a politician, he was also a farmer, accountant and tax consultant. Lerchenfeld was born in Köfering, Regensburg District, Bavaria. He was a Roman Catholic. He was married to Marie Therese. Lerchenfeld died of lung cancer on 1 December 2017, at the age of 65. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Philipp Graf Lerchenfeld at Parliamentwatch Category:1952 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Accountants Category:Cancer deaths in Germany Category:Deaths from lung cancer Category:Members of the German Bundestag Category:German Roman Catholics Category:People from Regensburg Category:Politicians from Bavaria Category:Politicians of the Christian Social Union of Bavaria
title: Philipp Graf Lerchenfeld
